alert.note: Alert for Butte; Central Black Hills; Harding; Northern Black Hills; Northern Foot Hills; Northern Meade Co Plains; Perkins; Southern Black Hills; Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills; Ziebach (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued February 24 at 1:54AM MST until February 24 at 9:00AM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 30 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of northeastern Wyoming and northwestern South Dakota. This includes the Black Hills and the Tribal Lands of the Cheyenne River Reservation. * WHEN...Until 9 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: A wind chill advisory means the combination of wind and cold temperatures will create dangerously low wind chill values. If you go outside, cover all parts of your body, especially your head, face, and hands.
